mapper.insert: insert into order_master(order_sn, order_customer_id, order_customer_name, order_customer_phone, order_customer_address, order_money, order_payment_money, order_create_time, order_status, order_modified_time) values (#{orderSn}, #{orderCustomerId}, #{orderCustomerName}, #{orderCustomerPhone}, #{orderCustomerAddress}, #{orderMoney}, #{orderPaymentMoney}, #{orderCreateTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderModifiedTime})
